title: [Large-scale] Programming Fundamentals: Project-Based Learning Through Gradual Skill Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Computer Literacy and Logical Thinking Skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environments using digital devices, with programming projects aimed at solving social issues.

learning_goals: Sequentially acquire four-level programming skills (tracing, syntax writing, template comprehension, template application) to analyze and generate complex code structures
Implement programs solving real-world social problems with over 80% completion through project-based assessment
Achieve over 90% completion rate of practice problems and reduce error rates to below 20% during the learning period
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
